name: OpArt Apart [B]
description:
One of the most beautiful puzzles in the world cut from the op art of Dan Zen (Dr Abstract). 

This ultra collectible NFT is made with ZIM, the JavaScript Canvas Framework to code creativity. Dr Abstract is the Founder of ZIM at https://zimjs.com. He is also the inaugural member of the Gadget Minters. 

See https://zimjs.com/nft - for making interactive NFTs. 
and https://zimjs.com/gadgetminters - for more info.
